articles.author: Erkki Forster
articles.title: Trump Vows to Step Up Unprecedented Assault on Immigrants - The Daily Beast
articles.description: The president, whose own mother was a naturalized citizen, doubled down on his vow to strip some Americans of their citizenship.
articles.content:
President Donald Trump has doubled down on his push to revoke some Americans citizenship. 
In the wake of Wednesdays shooting of two National Guard members in D.C. by an Afghan national, Trump decla… [+3158 chars]

articles.author: TOI Lifestyle Desk
articles.title: America’s favourite cooking oil linked to obesity, scientists find - The Times of India
articles.description: A recent study reveals that soybean oil, a common ingredient in American diets, may be significantly contributing to the obesity crisis. The research identifies metabolic pathways that explain weight gain associated with this prevalent cooking oil, urging for…
